data.title: Winslet and Mendes marry in secret
data.meta_description: THEIR mantelpiece may be laden with Oscars and Oliviers, but the actress Kate Winslet and the director Sam Mendes can now boast a feat guaranteed to make their celebrity peers even greener with envy.
data.text:
THEIR mantelpiece may be laden with Oscars and Oliviers, but the actress Kate Winslet and the director Sam Mendes can now boast a feat guaranteed to make their celebrity peers even greener with envy.

The golden couple of film and theatre yesterday revealed that they had married in a villa in the West Indies, without so much as a single paparazzo in the bushes to record the occasion.
